document_data.name: Morningstar Hollows
document_data.mainbody: '''Morningstar Hollows''' once was a small fishing village, abandoned due to the continual flooding of the [[Alaoreum River]]. The boggy village bacame home to a tribe of [[lizardfolk]].
document_data.Description: After the village was swallowed by Alaoreum River's bogs, the nature flourished growing huge [[river pine]]s, [[oak]]s, [[elm]]s, [[walnut]] and [[pecan]] trees.
document_data.Trade: The lizardfolk of Morningstar Hollows survived by fishing and hunting.
